title: Undecember is a new hardcore hack-and-slash ARPG coming October 12
description: Undecember is one of 2022’s most interesting hack-and-slash ARPGs, giving players tons of freedom to create unique and creative builds thanks to the absence of defined classes. A demo for the game is out now, and it releases in full on October 12.
